title: Handle an Accessorial Charge Dispute
description: A customer is disputing a detention charge on an invoice, claiming the driver was not detained.

tasks.description: Find the invoice and the specific detention charge being disputed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the correct invoice and charge.

tasks.description: Retrieve the signed Proof of Delivery for the load, which should have the driver's in and out times.
Review the in/out times, which show the driver was at the facility for 4 hours, justifying the detention charge.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent finds evidence that the charge is valid.

tasks.description: Contact the customer, provide them with a copy of the signed POD, and explain why the charge is valid.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent provides evidence to the customer and upholds the charge.
